programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice
programme.desc: Covering a fifth of the earth's surface, the Arctic tundra is one of the coldest places on the planet. The piercing temperatures and powerful winds challenge even the hardiest of creatures.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, a high-priced and ruthless jury "consultant" will stop at nothing to secure a verdict on an explosive trial.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An edge-of-your-seat espionage thriller, starring Richard Gere and Topher Grace as ex-CIA and FBI agents, trying to find the killer of a US senator, which bears the hallmark of an infamous Soviet assassin, thought to be dead.

programme.title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
programme.desc: When a violent earthquake rocks Southern California, hapless teenager Calvin Fuller (Thomas Ian Nicholas) finds himself careening through a hole torn in the fabric of time.

programme.title: Outlaw of Gor

programme.title: The Killer Shrews

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: The Beatniks

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Schwampbillies / Remember Fort Sunny Bottom

programme.desc: The campers discover an enchanted flashlight.

programme.desc: A travelling salesman visits Lakebottom one boring rainy day and sells McGee a magic pencil.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Duel to Remember

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Bloom of the Black Rose
programme.desc: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Welcome to the Fortune Cup
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Battle With the Black Rose
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Surprise, Surprise!
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 2
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dueling Minds

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea: Episode 3
programme.desc: Reports that a chemical weapon has been used in Salisbury changes the mood. When another chemical attack takes place in Syria, the ship goes to action stations for the first time.

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea: Episode 4
programme.desc: The crew stand-off with a Russian warship over Syria, and young sailor Danny tries for his first promotion, but chef Liam gets in trouble for drinking and might lose shore leave.

programme.title: Britain's Bloodiest Dynasty: Betrayal
programme.desc: Historian Dan Jones reveals how Henry II founded the Plantagenet dynasty.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 5
programme.desc: Tonight, we head south to Tasmania to see recently married couple JAMES & MELANIE devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 6
programme.desc: Tonight, we venture to West Australia to see Italian cousins DANIELA & STEFANIA devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 7
programme.desc: Tonight, we venture to Queensland to see urban hippies MAL & BEC devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as the couple battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tonight, we head to Victoria to see high-achievers KELLY & ASH devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as the married couple battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 9
programme.desc: Tonight, we venture down south to Tasmania to see cops ESTHER & ALI devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as these good friends battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 10
programme.desc: Tonight, it’s New South Wales’ turn as school mates Bill & Alex devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as these good friends battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Raw Greed
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives: False Witness
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Proof Of Innocence
programme.desc: DNA analysis overturns the convictions of three men who have spent years behind bars, paying for crimes they did not commit.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Death Grip
programme.desc: Fingerprinting: The Identification Division of the FBI relies on fingerprints as one of the most effective ways to identify criminals.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Double Helix
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's gruelling chef challenge continues. The ten remaining chefs are challenged to create unique dishes with a limited number of ingredients.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants compete in a bison-dish challenge that tests their archery and cooking skills. Plus, it's cowboy steak night with special guests news commentator Stacey Dash and Olympic gold medallist Phil Dalhausser.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the service challenge, VIP guests rapper Flo Rida and comic Jeff Dunham join the local chefs and their families. An angry Ramsay has to merge the teams to finish the service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams can only have one chef in the kitchen at a time as they prepare three entrees, each with a different protein.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must identify ice cream flavours in a blind taste test challenge; actress Meredith Baxter and Olympic swimmer Haley Anderson attend the dinner service.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian takes on a new challenge for a high-end car show.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian goes on the hunt for his biggest build yet.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian tries to turn a crazy concept into reality and complete the front end.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian builds through a major issue with the roof.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice."

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Otautau toddler Amber-Lee, aged two and a half, vanished from Kingston at the southern tip of Lake Wakatipu on October 17, 1992.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: It’s McLeod versus McLeod as Tess fights to stop Regan’s mining claim on Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Taking Flight
programme.desc: With Tess and Nick gone, Stevie is determined to prove herself as manager of Drovers Run. Dave and Kate form an unlikely team in the local Twitchathon.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Make Believe
programme.desc: Kate has fibbed to her grandmother about her job and her ‘fiancé’ Dave – now grandmother is coming to visit.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Heaven And Earth
programme.desc: As a raging dust storm approaches, Stevie battles to save a life.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Alex is overcome by toxic fumes while cleaning an old water tank. Jodi advises Meg on how to fix her relationship with Terry.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: If You Build It
programme.desc: Stevie locks horns with Sandra, but finds herself helping Sandra through a crisis.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Crawford Bay near Nelson British Columbia, search teams are looking for a missing 1946 two-seater vintage Ercoupe.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue combs the backcountry for a missing snowshoer.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR takes a maiden voyage in their new rescue boat to save a single mother and her young son.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Lions Bay and North Shore Rescue team up to long-line a severely injured French mountain climber off a steep rock face.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue is en route to the scene of a helicopter crash in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rookies get a chance to show their stuff while helping an injured hiker.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR uses underwater drop cameras to find a missing jet skier in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In the southern interior of British Columbia, Penticton SAR lowers a stretcher team down a steep embankment to rescue an injured driver who was thrown from his car.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whiteout conditions critically delay Pemberton SAR’s search for a lost snowmobiler. And later, surviving an avalanche!

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue turns a missing out of bounds snowboarder into a crusader of mountain safety.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tit for Tat Episode
programme.desc: A newly hired, attractive woman threatens Nick's job at the station.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Quarantine Episode
programme.desc: When Marilyn brings a dangerous flu back from a trip to Mexico, the family must stay inside their house under quarantine.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The My First Job Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tiger Dad Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to become a more effective parent, so he pushes Kevin and Lindsey to become better people.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Expensive Purse Episode
programme.desc: Against Nick's wishes, Suzanne buys an expensive purse and Nick becomes suspicious about it, so he uses her guilt to his advantage.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Master of Ceremonies Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes the subject to Nick's joke-off, and Suzanne retaliates against him.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Control Issue Episode
programme.desc: When Nick makes a point that Suzanne is too controlling of the family, Suzanne backs off the issue and later the family realizes that her controlling ways are just what they need.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Ghost Dog Episode
programme.desc: Nick, Suzanne, and Kevin pull pranks on each other, but their addiction leads to a near-death experience.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lemon Squeeze Episode
programme.desc: Gigi uses an adequate exercise when the family refuses to stop fighting with each other.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mother's-in-Law Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne's overprotective mother arrives and causes tension between her and Nick when she questions Nick's abilities as a husband.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tit for Tat Episode
programme.desc: A newly hired, attractive woman threatens Nick's job at the station.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Capesthorne Hall
programme.desc: The beauty of this magnificent Cheshire country house hides the horror that lies in its corridors. As well a poltergeist activity the team manage to catch some of their best evidence to date and even our sceptic hears noises.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1 of this terrifying place concentrates above ground. The team are alarmed at the results from a new piece of equipment and Yvette meets her match.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100’s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Monster - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark connect a young blind woman with a disfigured artist.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Monster - Part 2

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Good Doctor

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Alone

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3

programme.title: Galactica 1980
programme.desc: Adama (Lorne Greene) orders Troy and Dillon (Kent McCord, Barry Van Dyke) to rendezvous with what is believed to be a damaged Galactican ship.

programme.title: Galactica 1980
programme.desc: Troy and Dillon (Kent McCord, Barry Van Dyke) pursue two Cylons who want to commandeer a New York broadcasting facility so they can transmit coordinates to the battle fleet.

programme.title: Galactica 1980

programme.title: Galactica 1980
programme.desc: The fate of space warrior Lt. Starbuck (special guest star Dirk Benedict) is revealed in a vivid dream of teenage genius, Dr. Zee.

programme.desc: Blake offers to help Amanda find her father. Claudia goes out with Dean on a dinner, while Steven rejects Luke. Jeff ends up sleeping with Nicole. Dominique goes to Istanbul to meet with Rashid Ahmed.

programme.title: Dynasty: Kristina
programme.desc: Krystle goes into premature labor and delivers a baby girl, who suffers from respiratory problems. She names the child Kristina after a friend who once saved her life. Claudia is uneasy when Steven accompanies Luke on a business trip.

programme.title: Dynasty: Swept Away
programme.desc: Upon learning that he may be Amanda's father, Blake resolves to ask Amanda to take a blood test. Nicole tells Jeff there's a chance Peter DeVilbis may have been with another woman at the time of the crash.

programme.title: Dynasty: That Holiday Spirit
programme.desc: Blake buys back his racehorse Allegre from owner Daniel Reece, who sends Krystle a gift. Furious, she demands to know how he dare approach her after what happened with her sister, Iris. Amanda learns she is Blake's daughter.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Avenger
programme.desc: Krystle reconciles with Daniel, who reveals that his break-up with her sister was amicable. Claudia moves into La Mirage. Krystle confides to Steven that Daniel is Sammy Jo's father and therefore little Danny's grandfather.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.144
programme.desc: Young woman weeps as mother seeks reimbursement for apartment co-signing. Dog's vet bill sparks dispute with mother-in-law.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.71
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-husband of assaulting her with binoculars after accusing him of cheating on Mother’s Day. Boy accused of hitting child with rock; child’s mother sues ex-live-in boyfriend for cost of fixing daughter’s broken teeth.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.213
programme.desc: Woman loans $5,000+ to online acquaintance for his divorce lawyer; he claims it's a gift. Another sues ex-fiancé for unpaid motorcycle loan and demands medical bill reimbursement for daughter's ex.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.187
programme.desc: A man sacrifices his job and house to move for his girlfriend but faces a broken lease and ring dispute after their breakup. Another man is sued by his child's grandmother for allegedly vandalizing her Chrysler Sebring.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.101

programme.desc: A young tenant disputes custody of a band's equipment and unpaid rent with former landlords. Man sues seller and girlfriend for refund after alleged failed vehicle purchase from online ad.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.251
programme.desc: Allegations arise in a lawsuit where a woman sues her ex for a loan to break his apartment lease. A CD collection is withheld amid a dispute between former partners. A man goes into rehab for addiction, leading to his ex-roommate suing after he moved out.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.22
programme.desc: Intoxicated partygoer alleges knocked-out cold, seizures, 68 stitches from bottle hit, sues woman/Ex-roommates dispute rent, apartment damages, stolen property.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine Redecorates/Arthur The Loser
programme.desc: Francine and Catherine are very different, but it’s no fun if you're two sisters sharing the same room. Then, there's only one thing in life Arthur really wants—to win! But he just can't stop losing. Is it really so wrong to cheat a little?

programme.title: Arthur: The Chronicles of Buster/On this Spot
programme.desc: Buster learns that special effects can't take the place of hard work when conquering real mountains. Arthur is thrilled to find out that Sitting Bull once passed through town! He rallies the residents to mark the spot with a monument.

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls – Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but don’t know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain/Thanks a Lot, Binky
programme.desc: Fern can't wait to climb Moose Mountain so that she can have adventures like Zutzut, the famous comic-book hero! Then, Binky decides to become "No More Mr. Nice Guy" after not getting thanked for saving Rattles from a dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last of Mary Moo Cow/Bitzi's Beau
programme.desc: When Mary Moo Cow is cancelled, D.W. is devastated. How can television--or life as she knows it--ever be the same? Buster hasn't yet met Bitzi's new boyfriend, but he fears the worst. What if he is a Mom-stealer?

programme.title: Arthur: Maria Speaks/Postcards from Binky
programme.desc: Maria has always been a silent fixture in Mr. Ratburn's third-grade class. But her time to speak has finally come. Can she fix her stutter? When Binky's grandparents miss his big soccer game, he decides to film a video reenactment.

programme.title: Arthur: Based on a True Story (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: There's a new kid in town: Ladonna Compson, the Louisiana native with the gift of gab. Ladonna charms Arthur and friends with her amazing "true" stories. But are her stories really fact…or fiction?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Birthday/Francine Frensky, Superstar
programme.desc: Only four more days until Arthur's birthday party! But to Arthur's horror, it turns out Muffy's having her birthday party on the very same day. And, now that Francine finally has the lead in a school play, she's has become a stage tyrant.

programme.title: Arthur: The Blackout/Mei Lin Takes a Stand
programme.desc: It's a hot day in Elwood City, and a total blackout leaves its residents without electricity! Will Arthur and DW survive without AC and TV? Binky's baby sister Mei-Lin isn't keen on learning to walk and would rather stick to crawling.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Hitler rules Europe triumphantly, hailed as a hero in Germany. Hitler invades the Soviet Union, promising swift victory over communism, but progress stalls. As Germany faces setbacks, Hitler retreats to his bunker in Poland, increasingly reliant on drugs.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: This is the story of how Hitler orchestrated the genocide of 6 million Jews. Hitler portrayed Jews as a societal threat, using Goebbels' propaganda. Deportations were masked as resettlements while Auschwitz-Birkenau became a death factory.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: By 1944, Hitler's image as a victorious leader is crumbling. He faces a bomb plot led by Stauffenberg and Tresckow, intending to kill him and overthrow the regime. Hitler survives the bombing, triggering a brutal reprisal against conspirators.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In January 1945, Nazi Germany faces defeat as Allied armies close in. Hitler, aged 55 and in poor health, remains defiant in his Berlin bunker. On April 30th, 1945, Hitler commits suicide, and days later, Germany surrenders, ending World War II.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In WWII's final months, Allies discover Nazi death camps, prompting a sweeping denazification of Germany post-war. Nuremberg trials convict top Nazis. Former Nazis are employed by the West in the Cold War struggle against the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with love-of-her-life James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Felicia
programme.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Southern sweetheart Kelsie is madly in love with her online Romeo, Brandon. But after years of endless excuses about meeting up, Kelsie recruits Nev and Max to find who Brandon really is. (S6, ep14)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The Hills: Out With The Old
programme.desc: After a rocky summer with her boyfriend Jason, Lauren decides to break it off and returns to work to face her boss. Heidi finds herself in trouble with a guy both she and Audrina are dating. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The Hills: When You Least Expect It / The Best Night Ever
programme.desc: Lauren goes on her first date since Jason and is tested at work when she's asked to work a fashion show. Heidi has a life changing secret she must tell her boyfriend. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.desc: Billy Fox, 33, is a devoted father of two and a soccer coach. He appears to be an all-around regular guy. But he’s booked for the death of a baby. It's a charge that could put him in prison for the rest of his life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: AKA Rockefeller
programme.desc: Authorities suspect a con man who has used many different identities may be a murderer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Missing Molly
programme.desc: A report on the unsolved abduction and murder of 16-year-old Molly Bish. Bish disappeared in June 2000 from the local swimming hole. In May 2003, Tim McGuigan, a former police officer, helped discover evidence that lead to the discovery of Molly’s body.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: An interview with 17-year-old Jacque Marris who reveals new details about her abduction and how she and Tamara Brooks, another teenage victim, survived a harrowing 12-hour kidnapping on Aug. 1, 2002.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death in the Parsonage
programme.desc: An apparent suicide in a Pennsylvania church exposes a pastor's secret.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Why Did Josh Kill?
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Maddie Clifton of Jacksonville, Florida went outside to play and never came back. Seven days later a city-wide search led to the home of Josh Phillips, a 14-year-old neighbor, where Maddie's body was found under the boy's waterbed.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Floyd wants to do the show but Jon’s is the scheduled guest.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Bear Facts/Nothing To Be Afraid/The Big Talker
programme.desc: Garfield runs into a bear and Binky./The crew try to find one item that Wade will not be afraid of./Garfield makes a local talk show host regret his anti-cat comments.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Star Struck/Election Daze/Dirty Business
programme.desc: Garfield writes his own script for the show./The weasel convinces Roy to suggest an election./Jon visits his cousin Berferd.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The doctors take a closer look inside their ears to prove how earwax has a really important job to do and Dr Xand meets a pioneering professor who makes body parts.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors look at the awesome work that goes on inside the liver and Dr Chris extracts snot from members of the public for a very useful experiment.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors prove that we all have invisible ink inside our bodies and Dr Xand sees head lice removed from someone's hair with a vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors use real stomach acid to do a gross experiment, to reveal how the digestion process starts. Also, Dr Chris proves that the younger you are, the more sounds you can hear.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors show that your breath is just as unique as your fingerprints and Dr Chris goes behind the scenes of medical drama `Casualty' to see how they make fake body parts look so realistic.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand demonstrate an awesome body trick to amaze others with and reveal another way the human body heals itself after an injury. The doctors also look at some of their best bits of Operation Ouch so far.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris uses a tiny camera to reveal what happens in his throat when he swallows food and Dr Xand enters a special chamber that removes sensory data from his brain.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The doctors reveal how much power there is in your farts. Also, Dr Chris trains as a nurse on a ward full of robotic patients, and Dr Xand opens up the brand new Ouch-Mobile - a drop-in clinic for all medical mysteries.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Tonbo and Hinoki face off on the course, exchanging bold shots that shift Hinoki's view of her. Despite strong winds, their skills shine. Meanwhile, Igarashi arrives with a special gift for Tonbo's fresh start in Kumamoto.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Seeing Tonbo's skill, Coach Hajime sets his sights on the Kyushu Women's Championship. But first, she must qualify. Balancing high school, practice range, and course time, Tonbo trains hard to secure her spot in the tournament.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: On day one of the Kyushu Women’s Championship, Tonbo is paired with Shima-san, a housewife golfer who barely qualifies. Though some competitors are irritated, Shima-san’s unique style soon inspires those around her.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Tonbo leads her first tournament with a bold, freewheeling golf style! On day two, she's paired with top players Hinoki, Tsubura, and Ema, who's fighting for a comeback after a rough past. The competition heats up from the first hole!

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: On day two of the tournament, Tonbo, Hinoki, Tsubura, and Ema are paired up. Hinoki feels pressured by her father, Tsubura plays her usual style, and Ema makes a comeback. Tonbo stays carefree, while Hinoki surprises everyone with a bold move.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Igarashi arrives in Kumamoto the night before the final day, offering Tonbo advice. On the last day, with trainee caddie Nishida, Tonbo uses the wind to her advantage, climbing the leaderboard and becoming a serious rival to Hinoki, Tsubura, and Ema.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: On the final day, Tonbo plays freely while Hinoki, Tsubura, and Ema close in. Hinoki leads at halftime but seems down. In the second half, Hinoki's shot hits a tree branch, causing an unexpected setback for her.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: On the final day, Hinoki uses a penalty to reset mentally, Tsubura plays strategically, and Emma risks a shot despite her injury. Meanwhile, Tonbo feels the weight of competition, leading to a shift in her resolve.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: With three holes left, Tonbo charges, closing in on the leader. Tsubura and Emma struggle, while Hinoki regains composure. All four are tied, setting up a dramatic finish. On the final hole, Tonbo's tee shot takes an unexpected turn, changing everything.

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Emma powers through her injury, Hinoki battles her limits, and Tsubura stays true to her style. Tonbo cheers them on from the sidelines. The intense showdown over the final stroke builds to a thrilling, unexpected finish.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: The Piano Lesson
programme.desc: Ray learns a "noteworthy" lesson in honesty when he "fibs" and tells a tone-deaf Tamera that she plays the piano well, and she winds up humiliating herself at a piano recital.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Summer Bummer
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera trade places so that Tia can be with a cute guy in summer school and Tamera can "goof off" by taking Tia's spot as a camp counselor.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: When Spike answers Sam's sister's desperate plea for help, he is forced, at gunpoint, to help two criminals steal evidence from the fortress that is the Metro Evidence Depot.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Team One is called in to try and stop a conflict at a psychiatric hospital where a stabbing has just taken place.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Greg Parker immediately faces suspension from the team after keeping the relationship between two team members a secret.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: A fire captain who feels nothing he does is good enough is given the chance to prove to himself and to an injured member of his crew that he can set things right.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Team One is looking for an armed and abusive man who has tracked down his ex-wife demanding to know where their daughter, who is celebrating her 18th birthday, is.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch two children climb a church tower to watch their mums ring the church bells. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po each sing a special song into Tinky Winky's bag, but when he drops his bag their songs make a lovely new mixed up song.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies love jump, but they stop to see Andy Brown and some children take a trip on a boat to see Funghi the Dolphin. The Teletubbies are out in Teletubbyland. When they meet each other, they say hello, making sure no-one is missed out.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children practise yoga. In Teletubbyland, the Teletubbies are very busy. Tinky Winky is marching with his bag, Dipsy is dancing with his hat, Laa-Laa is playing with her ball and Po is riding her scooter.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Some children play a game called oranges and lemons. A bell appears in Teletubbyland and makes a lovely ringing noise. The noise is so loud it makes the Tubbies fall over laughing

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po fetches the others to watch some girls perform an Indian dance. In Teletubbyland, Dipsy dances a very special dance. Dipsy showed Tinky Winky his very special dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are eating Tubby Toast. They stop to watch Amy making pasta. A ball of string appears in Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The toaster makes an extra piece of Tubby Toast – but who is going to eat it? The Teletubbies watch Emily And Jamie take their dog Jessie for a walk before giving her a bath.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Some children have fun moving to Drum music. In Teletubbyland, all the Teletubbies are asleep, but then Tinky Winky sings a loud song.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance around a tree. The Teletubbies and a group of children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty cloud.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and Dizzy have spent the night at Bob’s old yard in Bobsville to help Wendy with some digging and mixing. The machines all wish that Wendy could come and live out in Sunflower Valley.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and the machines are in Sunflower Valley setting up Wendy’s caravan. Scoop contacts Muck to find out where Bob has got to. Muck explains that they haven’t left Bobsville yet because they’ve lost Bob’s Dad!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Bentley is organising a winter fair in the town hall square and enlists Bob to help set up the stalls, lights and the centrepiece of the fair – a giant inflatable Santa Claus.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building a bunkhouse for Farmer Pickles guests The Pickers! Micky, Vicky and Little Ricky are helping with the sunflower harvest. The cabin is to be made of logs so Lofty’s job is very important today, lifting and laying the logs.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its early morning in Sunflower Valley and Benny arrives bursting with enthusiasm. He’s not needed in Bobsville today and he’s come to the Valley to help. Today, the team are building Mr and Mrs Bentley’s special new house.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy and Bob have a very special announcement to make. They are going to fix up an old Houseboat for Wendy to live in. There’s a lot of hard work to be done. They need to make a gang plank, fix solar panels and give it a really good clean.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Scoop and Skip are helping Mr Beasley to install a new Rockery when Mr Bentley appears to ask for Bob’s help. The Mayor wants to stage an art exhibition, but there are no available venues. Scoop suggests renovating the inside of the Old Mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergill’s allergies, he goes to his sister’s for the day. But she doesn’t get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Whilst Bob and the team build Annie Pickles new seafront house, Muck is worried that Scoop is a better digger than he is and decides to prove himself with a sandcastle competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has been asked to install a new air conditioning unit at Mr Sabatini’s restaurant. Wendy and Molly meanwhile have been asked to redecorate the library at the school.

programme.title: When Bob Became a Builder
programme.desc: It’s a beautiful day in Sunflower Valley and Bob and his machine team are building a new picnic area at the beach. Dizzy, Lofty and Scrambler are clearing stuff that’s been washed up on the beach, while Benny has a great time digging with Scoop and Muck.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles has decided to open a camp site on his land, and Bob is installing a shower block and fence to keep the sheep out. For once, he is working on his own while Wendy goes on holiday with Jenny.

programme.title: Bob's Big Plan
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are building an extension to the offices of Mr Adams the local architect, Bob hears of a competition to build a brand new town in nearby Sunflower Valley, a place Bob knows very well from his childhood. Mr Adams shows Bob his idea.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is replacing a potting shed on Mr Beasley’s allotment. In the old shed is a chest which Mr Beasley doesn’t need any more. Meanwhile Wendy calls at JJ’s for the materials for the new shed.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is erecting a tent to accommodate some newcomers to the valley. Mr Bentley is organising everything, but unfortunately leaves his phone with Spud who promptly declares himself ‘Mr Bentley’s Assistant’.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Ellis has a batch of Doves delivered, to use in his magic act, and asks Bob to build a dovecote for his new birds to live in. Mr Ellis realises that he has to go to work but does not want to leave the birds at home alone.

programme.title: Race to the Finish
programme.desc: Mayor Bentley announces that Sunflower Valley is to stage its very first athletics tournament. A team from Sunflower Valley is to compete against a team of visiting athletes. Plus there is to be a special machine event!

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Peter Tobin
programme.desc: Peter Tobin is one of the most notorious serial killers in the UK. From 1991–2006 he raped and murdered three young girls; Dinah McNicol, Vicky Hamilton and Angelika Kluk. Yet even prior to these horrific murders he had a history of violence.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Crossbow Cannibal
programme.desc: Former friends of Stephen Griffiths open up about the Bradford serial killer, who was caught firing a crossbow through Suzanne Blamires' head in 2010.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Jeremy Bamber

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A disembodied mutant takes over the bodies of various people and sets out to go after the ones who did this to him. One of them is a doctor that Shalimar likes.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: While on a job, Shalimar is injured and is helped by another feral mutant, Nikki, whom she knew and was almost chosen for the team. While Shalimar recuperates, she offers to fill in.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan's shady ex-girlfriend turns to him for help when her latest scam takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team faces its most dangerous mission yet: stopping a group of eco-terrorists.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is upset with Adam, who tells him that he was entrusted to keep a secret and leaves after talking to that person. The man is looking for someone and is willing to kill anyone to get to that person.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath
programme.desc: A college friend of Renee's resurfaces and leads them on an investigation of the link between the Taelons and a biomedical facility's cloning operation.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: A Senator's daughter is found to have kryss in her system. Liam and Renee suspect the Taelons lied about synthesizing it and there is a new location for production. They believe Federov is involved. Da'an is addicted to kryss.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Limbo
programme.desc: The Taelons lend some of their dwindling core energy to Joshua Doors for a pilot cold fusion project, but the energy is stolen, leaving the Taelons vulnerable. Jonathan Doors lives on as an AI in cyberspace.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Motherlode
programme.desc: Augur is caught and placed in a special prison where he is placed in a sensory deprivation chamber. An amoralist gets him out and wants Augur to help him steal the gold Zo'or has on the mothership. When Liam learns of what happened he tries to find Augur.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Take No Prisoners
programme.desc: The ANA negotiate amnesty for all resistance members, Liam tries to convince resistance member Halley Simmons to take the offer. Sandoval uses parasites to make volunteers do suicide missions against the resistance.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Secret
programme.desc: An assassin threatens the explorers, and Marguerite fears that he may be linked to her past and come to settle old scores. The secret she tries to bury creates a rift between herself and Roxton.

programme.title: The Lost World: Finn
programme.desc: An experiment with new energy sources goes awry, launching Roxton, Challenger, and Marguerite 100 years into the future. They discover that the rest of the world has been ravaged by war.

programme.title: The Lost World: Suspicion
programme.desc: Finn joins the explorers at the Treehouse. A team of archeologists suffer disease, violence, and distrust after opening an ancient urn that may have housed a demonic spirit.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Imposters
programme.desc: The explorers seek out a portal, but are overtaken by a force that replaces Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger with three demons. With an age of chaos impending, Finn must bring back her friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Elixir
programme.desc: Challenger tests his nutritional elixir, but the drink causes hallucinations of his wife and younger self to appear in the treehouse. The others must find a cure before his visions become deadly.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tapestry
programme.desc: Challenger is taken captive by a WWI transport pilot guarding a crashed plane full of stolen iridium ingots. He, Roxton, and Marguerite relive their deepest secrets, each connected to the cargo.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Goalkeepers Peter Shilton and Peter Schmeichel buy and sell antiques around Cheshire, aided by Paul Laidlaw and Mark Stacey. They visit a Cycling Museum in Warrington and a Football Museum in Manchester, ending up at auction in Runcorn.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Silent Witness stars Emilia Fox and Tom Ward, aided by experts James Braxton and Charlie Ross, embark on a hunt for antiques to turn a profit. From Glasgow to the Village of Kilbarchan, they end at auction in Billingshurst in West Sussex.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Masterchef's Gregg Wallace and John Torode feel the heat as they team up with experts Charles Hanson and Charlie Ross. They visit stately homes on their way from Alton in Hampshire to auction at Fernhurst on the Surrey/West Sussex border.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Sue Holderness and John Challis bargain hunt with Charles Hanson and Philip Serrell in Essex for auction in Kent. Can John outsmart his TV wife or will Sue win big? Hopefully, both teams will do well as all profits go to Children in Need.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: Jamie Hughes

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: Youth Darts

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: The Story of Gerwyn Price
programme.desc: Scott Mitchell and Paul Nicholson reflect on the story of Gerwyn Price discussing his career and achievements.

programme.title: Road to Champions Week

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: James Hubbard

programme.title: The Vault

programme.title: The Best of Steve Beaton: Top Moments & Highlights

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Enemy Within
